'''''In Search of Frittered Time''''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Wonders of the World]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to reach [[Reputation]] Lv. 10 in [[Fontaine]].

==Trivia==
* The name of the achievement is most probably a reference to a novel titled ''{{w|In Search of Lost Time}}'' by the French writer {{w|Marcel Proust}}.
